item.title: #en @ 1440980239434145795
item.description: Simple questions like where's open data? Why are you selling publicly-funded data? Communities and LGUs need to make robust plans, they shouldn't have to write letters in this day and age. Also, so we see our blind spots, where we need more R&D funding, spread the funding out.
